ISSUE.TITLE: Error: escSL is not defined
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: Hi, could you help me with the error: `$ now --docker` `> Deploying C:\projects\app under my@mail.com` `> Error! escSL is not defined` I haven't found anything about this message. I suppose that it can be missing sertificate or similar, but not sure. PS. I'm using free plan. Thanx in advance
